testcase.name: PRE-STEP 1 Reboot device via UART
STEP 1 Set custom network configuration
STEP 1.1 Set custom network config
STEP 1.2 Verify custom IP
STEP 1.3 Verify custom Gateway
STEP 2 Set alternating channel states (odd ON, even OFF)
STEP 2.1 Set CH1 to ON
STEP 2.2 Set CH2 to OFF
STEP 2.3 Set CH3 to ON
STEP 2.4 Set CH4 to OFF
STEP 2.5 Set CH5 to ON
STEP 2.6 Set CH6 to OFF
STEP 2.7 Set CH7 to ON
STEP 2.8 Set CH8 to OFF
STEP 2.9 Verify CH1 state via SNMP
STEP 2.10 Verify CH2 state via SNMP
STEP 2.11 Verify CH3 state via SNMP
STEP 2.12 Verify CH4 state via SNMP
STEP 2.13 Verify CH5 state via SNMP
STEP 2.14 Verify CH6 state via SNMP
STEP 2.15 Verify CH7 state via SNMP
STEP 2.16 Verify CH8 state via SNMP
STEP 3 Reboot and verify network config persistence
STEP 3.1 Reboot device
STEP 3.2 Get network config after reboot
STEP 3.3 Verify network config persisted
STEP 4 Verify channel states not persisted after reboot
STEP 4.1 [NEGATIVE TEST] MUST FAIL - Verify CH1 state via SNMP
STEP 4.2 [NEGATIVE TEST] MUST FAIL - Verify CH2 state via SNMP
STEP 4.3 [NEGATIVE TEST] MUST FAIL - Verify CH3 state via SNMP
STEP 4.4 [NEGATIVE TEST] MUST FAIL - Verify CH4 state via SNMP
STEP 4.5 [NEGATIVE TEST] MUST FAIL - Verify CH5 state via SNMP
STEP 4.6 [NEGATIVE TEST] MUST FAIL - Verify CH6 state via SNMP
STEP 4.7 [NEGATIVE TEST] MUST FAIL - Verify CH7 state via SNMP
STEP 4.8 [NEGATIVE TEST] MUST FAIL - Verify CH8 state via SNMP
STEP 5 Factory reset device
STEP 5.1 Perform factory reset (RFS)
STEP 6 Verify factory defaults restored
STEP 6.1 Get network config after factory reset
STEP 6.2 Verify baseline network config restored
STEP 6.3 Verify all channels reset to OFF
STEP 7 Multiple reboot cycle stability test
STEP 7.1 Reboot cycle 1
STEP 7.2 Verify ready after reboot 1
STEP 7.3 Reboot cycle 2
STEP 7.4 Verify ready after reboot 2
STEP 7.5 Reboot cycle 3
STEP 7.6 Verify ready after reboot 3
STEP 7.7 Verify config stable after multiple reboots
STEP 8 Final EEPROM dump and analysis
STEP 8.1 Analyze EEPROM dump after all tests
TEARDOWN 1 Ensure all outputs OFF
TEARDOWN 2 Final verify all outputs OFF
